about_the_game:
Are You Prepared to Navigate the Unthinkable?

Journey into the heart of a mystical forest graveyard with "Engraving." Step into the life of Silas, a man once motivated by greed, now entangled in an intricate web of ancient curses and haunting spirits.

An Unstable, Ever-Changing Terrain

Hand-Drawn Maps: Your main tool is your ability to draw portions of the forest. But beware; the landscape isn't constant. Fall asleep, and you'll awaken to a world transformed.

Curse of Exhaustion: Every step taken depletes your energy, leading you into slumber. When you awake, the forest's layout will have shifted, resetting your progress in this labyrinthine world.

A Realm Dominated by Ethereal Forces
Eerie Spirits: The deeper you explore, the more you unveil about the spirits that call this forest their eternal home. Will you evade their ethereal influence or succumb to the haunting?

Key Features

  • First-person exploration with unique map-drawing mechanic and map driven gameplay
  • An atmospheric, original soundtrack
  • Navigate the shifting forest and its spectral inhabitants

In "Engraving," each choice could be your last as you weave through a hauntingly beautiful and unstable world. Will you escape this shadowy labyrinth or become a permanent etching in its tormented history?
